text: Bwe muba mutuukiddwako obuvune (mu lutalo lwe Uhud) nabali baatuukwako obuvune ng’obwo (mu lutalo lwe Badr) nabwekityo bulijjo ennaku tuzikyusakyusa wakati wa bantu (olumu lw’ono, olundi lwa mulala) olwo nno Katonda ayawule abakkiriza, mu ngeri yeemu ajje mu mmwe abafiira mu kulwanirira eddiini era bulijjo Katonda tayagala beeyisa bubi
